body: This small box contains a wide variety of remedies and treatments against not only specific poisons but also their most common methods of delivery, including such things as purgatives to eliminate ingested toxins. It grants a +3 circumstance bonus on Heal checks made to treat poison. An antidote kit is exhausted after 10 uses.
name: Antidote Kit
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Tools and Skill Kits/Antidote Kit
